channel.title: Forward Error Correction blog
channel.description: Recent content on Forward Error Correction blog

item.title: Week 1: May 28-31
item.description: This summer, I am contributing to GNU Radio through Google Summer of Code. I recently completed my Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering, and I’m starting a PhD program in Networks/Communications in the fall. My project involves overhauling GNU Radio’s forward error correction (FEC) / error coding package (gr-fec). Other open source libraries like AFF3CT (https://aff3ct.github.io/) include additional FEC implementations compared to GNU Radio. I will add FEC techniques from AFF3CT’s library into GNU Radio and develop a testbench to compare throughput and error rate for different techniques and implementations.
